EmailTemplate.name: Cross SBU.CSO Tulsa BPO Transition ATR
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Tulsa Order Management Transitions to Infosys
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Normal 0 false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4
Honeywell Aerospace 6930 N. Lakewood Drive Tulsa, OK 74117
March 25, 2015
Dear Honeywell Customer, In 2013 we announced a new partnership with Infosys to provide order management services to our
customers. Starting this month, we'll transition the repair and product order management services performed at our Tulsa, Oklahoma, facility to Infosys. This transition will begin on March 30th, 2015; with Infosys fully managing the Tulsa order management transactions on April 24th, 2015. What this means to you:
On March 30th, 2015, customers will perform the following transactions via email or web.
- For Repair and Overhaul (R&O) inquiries, please use the following email address:
AeroRepairs@Honeywell.com <mailto:AeroRepairs@honeywell.com> -- for Orders, Order Status and Communications
CPSQuoteApprovals@Honeywell.com <mailto:CPSQuoteApprovals@Honeywell.com> -- for all R&O Quote Approvals
- For Spares inquiries, please access the Honeywell portal at Myaerospace.com <http://www.myaerospace.com>
To ensure full compliance, all associated Infosys and Honeywell employees are trained and aware of export compliance rules and regulations. Further, Infosys employees handling EAR restricted information are all United States citizens.
During this transition, we'll be conducting training and performing knowledge transfer activities requiring both Honeywell and Infosys CSRs to view and access customer portals. As a result, you may receive email notifications from both your Honeywell and Infosys CSRs through a shared Honeywell email account.
Visit the Honeywell portal for online tutorial videos <https://commerce.honeywell.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/HonMultimediaTutorialsCategoryCmd?storeId=10651> on creating an account, placing an order, parts
availability and more. Yours Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace
